thread.section_title: RingBritain.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RingBritain.com | ringbritain.com
thread.title: Rob Evans

author: Rob Evans
title: Rob Evans
text: Very good service and good rates. Although the rate was better in the beginning and went up slightly. This service has made making calls back home to my family much more affordable . The one down side is since the cell calling is done through the app, service can be not great if LTE service is poor in areas. But overall, I would and have recommended ring Britain to a number of people.
